item.title: Intro to CloudEvents
item.description: I would like to do a series of CloudEvents posts on some of my takes on the “what”, “why” and “how” but before we can get there, let’s take a moment to understand why CloudEvents in the first place. In the cloud space, we talk a lot about the portability of applications that target Kubernetes. This is because you can take the manifests you develop on your k8s cluster locally and, with a fairly high confidence level, apply them to another cluster in any provider and they just work.
